net.toddm.comm

Class CommManager.WorkCallable

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.toddm.comm.CommManager.WorkCallable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<Response>
    Enclosing class:
    CommManager

    private class CommManager.WorkCallable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<Response>
    An implementation of Callable that makes the actual network request and gets the response

        public Response call()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Specified by:
        call in interface java.util.concurrent.Callable<Response>
        Throws:

      • processesRequest

        private Response processesRequest()
        Does the actual on-the-wire work of the request and returns the results.

        This method is blocking.

      • handleWorkUpdatesOnException

        private void handleWorkUpdatesOnException(java.lang.Exception e)
        This method updates the current work state based on the given exception. The work is either queued for retry or marked as completed.

      • handleWorkUpdatesOnResponse

        private void handleWorkUpdatesOnResponse(Response response,
                               java.net.HttpURLConnection urlConnection)
        This method updates the current work state based on the given Response. This can potentially result in work being queued for the future, cache entries being updated, etc.

        Parameters:
        response - The Response that resulted from attempting the current work.

        private void cleanup()
